Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • Computer

  • public class Computer
extends Player
    Computer Player to play Racko, it uses a rudementary AI to make it's choices for now.

      • Fields inherited from class Player

      • choosePile

        public int choosePile(Card Top)
        Chooses what pile to draw from, either the Draw or Discard
        Specified by:
        choosePile in class Player
        Parameters:
        Top - The top of the Discard pile
        Returns:
        0 if it needs the Card from the Discard deck, or 1 to draw from the Draw deck.

      • positionWanted

        public int positionWanted(Card C)
        Gets the desired position of a certain Card
        Parameters:
        C - Card to get the desired position of
        Returns:
        The desired position of the Card

      • checkPosition

        public boolean checkPosition(int position)
        Checks to see if a certain position of the Rack is taken by a desired Card. It will use positionWanted to check to see if it is desired or not.
        Parameters:
        position - Position to check
        Returns:
        true if the position is filled with a desired slot or false if it is not.

      • chooseDiscard

        public Card chooseDiscard(Card C)
        Removes a Card from their Rack. This was rewritten for use in the GUI.
        Specified by:
        chooseDiscard in class Player
        Parameters:
        C - Card to remove from the Rack (including the extra slot)
        Returns:
        The Card once it's removed from the Rack.

      • getDiscard

        public Card getDiscard()
        Gets the Card that is wanted to be discarded, it doesn't actually remove it from anything.
        Returns:
        Card that is chosen to discard.
